name: ultraviolet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Ultraviolet light has a wavelength that is after the violet (= light purple) end of the range of colours that can be seen by humans. Light of this type causes the skin to become darker in the sun.

physics describes light at the purple end of the spectrum (= set of colors into which light is separated), which cannot be seen by human beings
